recipe_name: Chargrilled bananas with chilli butterscotch sauce
author: Brian Turner
method: For the bananas, heat a griddle pan, brush the bananas with the melted butter and griddle for 1-2 minutes on each side. Set aside. For the chilli butterscotch sauce, heat the butter in a saucepan, add the brown sugar and chilli and stir until well combined and melted. Pour in the cream and salt and bring to the boil. Turn down the heat and simmer for 2-3 minutes, or until smooth and thickened. To serve, place the griddled bananas onto a serving plate and pour over the butterscotch sauce.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter, melted,  2 bananas, peeled, halved lengthways,  55g/2oz butter,  4 tbsp soft brown sugar,  1 tsp chopped red chilli ,  125ml/4fl oz double cream,  pinch salt
